title: Add input validation for org numbers before API calls
close_reason: Added validation for all three countries with tests

title: Fix copy-pasted docs referencing MediaWiki
close_reason: Fixed CONTRIBUTING.md and SECURITY.md with Nordic Registry specific content

title: fix: Denmark vat field type mismatch
description:
The CVR API returns `vat` as a number (e.g., 24256790) but types.go expects a string.

**File:** internal/denmark/types.go:7
**Error:** json: cannot unmarshal number into Go struct field Company.vat of type string

**Fix:** Change `CVR string` to `CVR int` or use a custom type that handles both.

title: fix: Norway valgtAv field type mismatch
description:
The roles API returns `valgtAv` as an object with kode/beskrivelse, but types.go expects a string.

**File:** internal/norway/types.go:152
**Error:** json: cannot unmarshal object into Go struct field Role.rollegrupper.roller.valgtAv of type string

**Actual response:**
```json
{
  "kode": "AREP",
  "beskrivelse": "Representant for de ansatte",
  "_links": {...}
}
```

**Fix:** Create an ElectedBy struct type similar to RoleType.

title: Extract shared base client to reduce code duplication
close_reason: Created internal/base package with shared client infrastructure. Full migration of existing clients deferred as separate refactoring effort.

title: Add unit tests for country clients (Norway, Denmark, Finland)
close_reason: Added client_test.go for all three country clients with tests for initialization, options, concurrency, timeouts, and helper functions
